com.redhat.rhn.domain.org
Class OrgFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.org.OrgFactory

public class OrgFactory
extends HibernateFactory

A small wrapper around hibernate files to remove some of the complexities of writing to hibernate.
